document_data.caption: Map showing Pharra's Alley just north of the House of Wonder.
document_data.name: Pharra's Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Pharra's Alley''' was an alley in the [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]] near the [[House of Wonder]].
document_data.Geography: The alley ran west to east from [[Flint Street]] to [[Diamond Street]]. It was intersected from the north by [[Torch Lane]] and from the south by the [[Street of Spells]].
document_data.History: The alley was named for [[Pharra]], the first Magistress of the House of Wonder, who died in [[1247 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants:
[[Wizard]]s and [[cleric]]s of the [[Circle of Skulls]] haunted the alleyway, an infrequent and unpredictable phenomenon that the alley was infamous for.

The alley was often used as a convenient shortcut by merchants passing through and as a favorite gathering place for young apprentice [[mage]]s who hoped to impress the wizards of the nearby House of Wonder.
